Headline: #155 Devon Temporary Reroute at Devon/California
ShortDescription: 155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie and Devon, due to street blockage near Devon/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#155 Devon buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Devon, California, Pratt, Kedzie and Devon, due to street blockage near Devon/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute near Desplaines/Fulton
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses temp. rerouted NB: Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted & Milwaukee; SB: Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton & Desplaines.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Desplaines/Fulton, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Jefferson, Fulton, Halsted & Milwaukee.

Southbound buses will operate via Milwaukee, Kinzie, Clinton, Fulton & Desplaines.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Rosemont
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Rosemont due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Rosemont due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
